meanings.sent1: During the game, the players on the blue team were outnumbering the players on the red team.
meanings.sent2: In the race, the rabbits were outnumbering the turtles, moving much faster.
meanings.sent3: The ants were outnumbering the picnic guests, eager to join the feast.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the sky seemed to be outnumbering the grains of sand on the beach.
meanings.sent5: The colorful flowers in the garden were outnumbering the green leaves, creating a beautiful contrast.

meanings.sent1: The students in the classroom were outnumbering the teachers, making it a lively environment.
meanings.sent2: During the migration, the birds were outnumbering the other animals in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The cookies on the plate were outnumbering the vegetables, tempting the children.
meanings.sent4: The waves crashing on the shore seemed to be outnumbering the seashells on the beach.
meanings.sent5: The colorful balloons at the party were outnumbering the plain ones, adding a festive touch.
